description: built an iOS app that allowed users to buy products featured in bite-sized vertical videos using swift and firebase. incorporated social features such as creating and sharing videos, commenting on videos, and push notifications. implemented slick UI using custom collection views akin to TikTok's scroll view.
descriptive_points: built an iOS app using swift and firebase that allowed users to buy products featured in TikTok-like vertical videos with a focus on smooth & elegant design
incorporated social features such as creating and sharing videos, commenting on videos, and push notifications using firebase cloud messaging
extra_descriptive_points: implemented slick UI using custom collection views akin to TikTok's scroll view
